title: Somewhere to go
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation, John Morris and Brian Bergin
brief_description: Hugh Hudson, South Australian Minister for Education, discusses the establishment of school-based community centres in two Adelaide suburbs, Thebarton and Angle Park. The surveys and plans, initiated in mid 1973, show that an essential feature of the planning process was the participation of the communities concerned.
